greetings: Good morning. Welcome to the U.S. Embassy visa interview. Please hand me your passport and DS-160 confirmation.
Hello. Please step forward and provide your passport and visa application documents.
Good afternoon. How may I assist you with your visa application today?
questions: What is the purpose of your visit to the United States?
How long do you plan to stay in the United States?
Do you have any relatives or friends currently in the United States?
Have you ever visited the United States before?
Where will you be staying during your time in the United States?
What is your current occupation or job?
Who will be paying for your trip to the United States?
What ties do you have to your home country that will ensure you return after your visit?
Have you booked your travel tickets or accommodations yet?
Are you married? Do you have any children?
Why do you want to visit this particular location in the United States?
Do you plan to work or study while in the United States?
Can you provide details about your travel itinerary?
